title: Border, ca. 1850
description: Stylized rosettes connected by four bunched ribbons reserved in a red, black and pink-colored flocked ground. Red is the basic color of the flock. There is a gray and white ground in the reserved areas which continues the pattern painted on the flock. Unique in this respect.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, ca. 1850.
ca. 1850. Machine-printed and flocked. Gift of Josephine Howell, Inc.. 1959-160-44.
